text: __NOTOC__ Year 297 BC was a year of the pre-Julian Roman calendar. == Events == === By place === ==== Roman Republic ==== * Fabius Maximus Rullianus becomes consul for the fourth time. He defeats the Samnites in a battle near Tifernum. ==== Greece ==== * After Cassander's death from illness, Philip IV, Cassander's eldest son, becomes King of Macedon. Soon after this he suffers from a wasting disease and dies. Antipater, the next son, rules jointly with his brother Alexander V. * Demetrius Poliorcetes returns to Greece to become master of Macedonia. While Demetrius is in Greece, Lysimachus seizes his possessions in Asia Minor. * Ptolemy decides to support Pyrrhus of Epirus and restores him to his kingdom. At first Pyrrhus reigns with a kinsman, Neoptolemus II of Epirus. But he has him assassinated. ==== India ==== * Chandragupta Maurya goes to Sravana Belagola near Mysore to live in the way of Jains. * Bindusara his son goes to the Pataliputra throne. == Deaths == * King Cassander of Macedon (b. c. 358 BC)
title: 297 BC
